head.title: selector-no-attribute
head.description: selector-no-attribute Disallow attribute selectors. Options true The following patterns are considered warnings: The following patterns…

body:
#selector-no-attribute

Disallow attribute selectors.

    [rel="external"] {}
/** ↑
 * This type of selector */

#Options

#true

The following patterns are considered warnings:

[foo] {}
[rel="external"] {}
a,
[type="text"] {}
a > [foo] {}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a {}
.foo {}
#bar {}
rawBody:
# selector-no-attribute

Disallow attribute selectors.

```css
    [rel="external"] {}
/** ↑
 * This type of selector */
```

## Options

### `true`

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
[foo] {}
```

```css
[rel="external"] {}
```

```css
a,
[type="text"] {}
```

```css
a > [foo] {}
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a {}
```

```css
.foo {}
```

```css
#bar {}
```
raw:
---
title: selector-no-attribute
---

# selector-no-attribute

Disallow attribute selectors.

```css
    [rel="external"] {}
/** ↑
 * This type of selector */
```

## Options

### `true`

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
[foo] {}
```

```css
[rel="external"] {}
```

```css
a,
[type="text"] {}
```

```css
a > [foo] {}
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a {}
```

```css
.foo {}
```

```css
#bar {}
```
